ffmpeg_required: Me whakamahi te kōwae `{{module_name}}` i te **FFmpeg** kia mahi. Tāutahia mai i te paetukutuku mana: - [https://ffmpeg.org](https://ffmpeg.org) Mēnā kāore koe e hiahia ki tēnei āhuatanga, ka taea e koe te whakakore i tēnei kōwae i te wāhanga **Ngā Papatono Aunoa**, mā te pāwhiri rānei i te pātene i raro nei.
